mnd13:5.2: saccanti ca vādayanti → saccanti pavādayanti (sya-all) | saccanti ca pavādiyanti (pts-vp-pli1ed) | saccanti vivādayanti (^snp4.13#365 [Mahābyūhasutta])
mnd13:34.2: Pavedhatī → sa vedhati (bj) | sa vedhatī (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd13:44.8: patthenti, puthujjanakalyāṇakā → kalyāṇaputhujjanā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), niyāmāvakkantiṃ → niyāmāvattantiṃ (mr)
mnd13:44.11: vuddhipārihānivītivatto → vuddhiparihāniṃ vītivatto (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1ed) | vuḍḍhiparihāniṃ vītivatto (sya1ed, sya2ed) | vuddhiparihānivītivatto (^mnd10#121 [Purābhedasuttaniddesa])
mnd13:83.3: Sabbeva vādā → sabbe pavādā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed), tathiyā → tathivā (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mnd13:127.6: gathite ganthite → ganthe gathite (pts-vp-pli1ed), bandhe vibandhe ābandhe → baddhe vibaddhe ābaddhe (bj)
mnd13:128.2: Vivādajātesu sañjātesu nibbattesu abhinibbattesu pātubhūtesu → vivāde jāte sañjāte nibbatte abhinibbatte pātubhūte (bj, mr)
mnd13:154.2: munimuninoti → munimunino (cck, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | munimunayo (sya1ed, sya2ed)
